alive.text: On a side quest right now

nonfatal.text: (Player1) steals from (Player2) while they aren't looking.
(Player1) attacks (Player2), but they manage to escape.
(Player1) defeats (Player2) in a fight, but spares their life.
(Player1) begs for (Player2) to kill them. They refuse, keeping (Player1) alive.
(Player1) overhears (Player2) and (Player3) talking in the distance.
(Player1) sprains their ankle while running away from (Player2).
(Player1) loses sight of where they are.

fatal.text: (Player1) throws a knife into (Player2)'s head.
(Player1) accidentally steps on a landmine.
(Player1) catches (Player2) off guard and kills them.
(Player1) and (Player2) work together to drown (Player3).
(Player1) strangles (Player2) after engaging in a fist fight.
(Player1) shoots an arrow into (Player2)'s head.
(Player1) cannot handle the circumstances and commits suicide.
(Player1) bashes (Player2)'s head against a rock several times.
(Player1) snaps (Player2)'s neck.
(Player1) decapitates (Player2) with a sword.
(Player1) spears (Player2) in the abdomen.
(Player1) sets (Player2) on fire with a molotov.
(Player1) falls into a pit and dies.
(Player1) stabs (Player2) while their back is turned.
(Player1) severely injures (Player2), but puts them out of their misery.
(Player1) severely injures (Player2) and leaves them to die.
(Player1) bashes (Player2)'s head in with a mace.
(Player1) pushes (Player2) off a cliff during a knife fight.
(Player1) throws a knife into (Player2)'s chest.
(Player1) is unable to convince (Player2) to not kill them.
(Player1) convinces (Player2) to not kill them, only to kill (Player2) instead.
(Player1) falls into a frozen lake and drowns.
(Player1), (Player2), and (Player3) start fighting, but (Player2) runs away as (Player1) kills (Player3).
(Player1) kills (Player2) with their own weapon.
(Player1) overpowers (Player2), killing them.
(Player1) sets an explosive off, killing (Player2).
(Player1) sets an explosive off, killing (Player2), and (Player3).
(Player1) sets an explosive off, killing (Player2), (Player3), and (Player4).
(Player1) sets an explosive off, killing (Player2), (Player3), (Player4) and (Player5).
(Player1) kills (Player2) as they try to run.
(Player1) and (Player2) threaten a double suicide. It fails and they die.
(Player1), (Player2), (Player3), and (Player4) form a suicide pact, killing themselves.
(Player1) kills (Player2) with a hatchet.
(Player1) and (Player2) fight (Player3) and (Player4). (Player1) and (Player2) survive.
(Player1) and (Player2) fight (Player3) and (Player4). (Player3) and (Player4) survive.
(Player1) attacks (Player2), but (Player3) protects them, killing (Player1).
(Player1) severely slices (Player2) with a sword.
(Player1) strangles (Player2) with a rope.
(Player1) kills (Player2) for their supplies.
(Player1) shoots an arrow at (Player2), but misses and kills (Player3) instead.
(Player1) shoots a poisonous blow dart into (Player2)'s neck, slowly killing them.
(Player1) stabs (Player2) with a tree branch.
(Player1) stabs (Player2) in the back with a trident.
(Player1), (Player2), and (Player3) get into a fight. (Player1) triumphantly kills them both.
(Player1), (Player2), and (Player3) get into a fight. (Player2) triumphantly kills them both.
(Player1), (Player2), and (Player3) get into a fight. (Player3) triumphantly kills them both.
(Player1) kills (Player2) with a sickle.
(Player1) and (Player2) fight for a bag. (Player1) strangles (Player2) with the straps and runs.
(Player1) and (Player2) fight for a bag. (Player2) strangles (Player1) with the straps and runs.
(Player1) repeatedly stabs (Player2) to death with sais.
(Player1) begs for (Player2) to kill them. They reluctantly oblige, killing (Player1).

bloodbath.title: Bloodbath
bloodbath.description: As the tributes stand on their podiums, the horn sounds.

nonfatal.text: (Player1) rips a mace out of (Player2)'s hands.
(Player1) runs into the cornucopia and hides.
(Player1), (Player2), and (Player3) work together to get as many supplies as possible.
(Player1) grabs a backpack, not realizing it is empty.
(Player1) breaks (Player2)'s nose for a basket of bread.
(Player1) grabs a jar of fishing bait while (Player2) gets fishing gear.
(Player1) gathers as much food as they can.

fatal.text: (Player1) steps off their podium too soon and blows up.
(Player1) finds (Player2) hiding in the cornucopia and kills them.
(Player1) finds (Player2) hiding in the cornucopia, but (Player2) kills them.

nonfatal.text: (Player1) and (Player2) work together for the day.

fatal.text: (Player1) bleeds out due to untreated injuries.
(Player1) unknowingly eats toxic berries.
(Player1) taints (Player2)'s food, killing them.
(Player1) dies from an infection.
(Player1) attempts to climb a tree, but falls to their death.
(Player1) attempts to climb a tree, but falls on (Player2), killing them both.
(Player1)'s trap kills (Player2).
(Player1) kills (Player2) while they are resting.
(Player1) dies from hypothermia.
(Player1) dies from hunger.
(Player1) dies from thirst.
(Player1) dies trying to escape the arena.
(Player1) dies of dysentery.
(Player1) accidentally detonates a land mine while trying to arm it.
(Player1), (Player2), and (Player3) successfully ambush and kill (Player4), (Player5), and (Player6).
(Player1), (Player2), and (Player3) unsuccessfully ambush (Player4), (Player5), and (Player6), who kill them instead.
(Player1) forces (Player2) to kill (Player3) or (Player4). They decide to kill (Player3).
(Player1) forces (Player2) to kill (Player3) or (Player4). They decide to kill (Player4).
(Player1) forces (Player2) to kill (Player3) or (Player4). They refuse to kill, so (Player1) kills them instead as (Player3) and (Player4) escape.
(Player1) forces (Player2) to kill (Player3) or (Player4). They refuse to kill, so (Player1) kills all them instead.
(Player1) poisons (Player2)'s drink, but mistakes it for their own and dies.
(Player1) poisons (Player2)'s drink. They drink it and die.
(Player1), (Player2), (Player3), (Player4), and (Player5) track down and kill (Player6).
(Player1), (Player2), (Player3), and (Player4) track down and kill (Player5).
(Player1), (Player2), and (Player3) track down and kill (Player4).
(Player1) and (Player2) track down and kill (Player3).
(Player1) tracks down and kills (Player2).

nonfatal.text: (Player1) and (Player2) run into each other and decide to truce for the night.
(Player1) tries to sing themself to sleep.
(Player1) attempts to start a fire, but is unsuccessful.

fatal.text: (Player1) silently snaps (Player2)'s neck.

feast.title: The Feast
feast.description: The Cornucopia is replenished with food, supplies, weapons, and memoirs from the tributes' families.

nonfatal.text: (Player1) and (Player2) get into a fight over raw meat, but (Player2) gives up and runs away.
(Player1) and (Player2) get into a fight over raw meat, but (Player1) gives up and runs away.
(Player1), (Player2), and (Player3) confront each other, but grab what they want slowly to avoid conflict.
(Player1) gathers as much food into a bag as they can before fleeing.

arena.title: Event: Wolf Mutts
arena.description: Wolf mutts are let loose in the arena.

fatal.text: (Player1) is crushed by a pack of wolf mutts.
(Player1) is eaten by wolf mutts.
(Player1) knocks (Player2) out and leaves them for the wolf mutts.
(Player1) pushes (Player2) into a pack of wolf mutts
As (Player1) and (Player2) fight, a pack of wolf mutts show up and kill them both.

arena.title: Event: Acid Rain
arena.description: Acidic rain pours down on the arena.

fatal.text: (Player1) is unable to find shelter and dies.
(Player1) trips face first into a puddle of acidic rain.
(Player1) injures (Player2) and leaves them in the rain to die.
(Player1) refuses (Player2) shelter, killing them.
(Player1) shoves (Player2) into a pond of acidic rain, but is pulled in by (Player2), killing them both.

arena.title: Event: Hurricane
arena.description: A monstrous hurricane wreaks havoc on the arena.

fatal.text: (Player1) is sucked into the hurricane.
(Player1) is incapacitated by flying debris and dies.
(Player1) pushes (Player2) into an incoming boulder.
(Player1) stabs (Player2), then pushes them close enough for the hurricane to suck them in.
(Player1) tries to save (Player2) from being sucked into the hurricane, only to be sucked in as well.

arena.title: Event: Tracker Jacker Swarm
arena.description: A swarm of tracker jackers invades the arena.

fatal.text: (Player1) is stung to death.
(Player1) slowly dies from the tracker jacker toxins.
(Player1) knocks (Player2) unconscious and leaves them there as bait.
While running away from tracker jackers, (Player1) grabs (Player2)and throws them to the ground.
(Player1) and (Player2) run out of places to run and are stung to death.

arena.title: Event: Tsunami
arena.description: A tsunami rolls into the arena.

fatal.text: (Player1) is swept away.
(Player1) fatally injures themself on debris.
(Player1) holds (Player2) underwater to drown.
(Player1) defeats (Player2), but throws them in the water to make sure they die.
(Player1) and (Player2) smash their heads together as the tsunami rolls in, leaving them both to die.

arena.title: Event: Fire
arena.description: A fire spreads throughout the arena.

fatal.text: The fire catches up to (Player1), killing them.
A fireball strikes (Player1), killing them.
(Player1) kills (Player2) in order to utilize a body of water safely.
(Player1) falls to the ground, but kicks (Player2) hard enough to then push them into the fire.
(Player1) and (Player2) fail to find a safe spot and suffocate.

arena.title: Event: Border Shrink
arena.description: The arena's border begins to rapidly contract.

fatal.text: (Player1) is electrocuted by the border.
(Player1) trips on a tree root and is unable to recover fast enough.
(Player1) restrains (Player2) to a tree and leaves them to die.
(Player1) pushes (Player2) into the border while they are not paying attention
Thinking they could escape, (Player1) and (Player2) attempt to run through the border together.
(Player1) dies from internal bleeding caused by a monkey mutt.
(Player1) is pummeled to the ground and killed by a troop of monkey mutts.
(Player1) uses (Player2) as a shield from the monkey mutts.
(Player1) injures (Player2) and leaves them for the monkey mutts.
While running, (Player1) falls over and grabs (Player2) on the way down. The monkey mutts kill them.

arena.title: Event: Carnivorous Squirrels
arena.description: Carnivorous squirrels start attacking the tributes.

fatal.text: (Player1) is brutally attacked by a scurry of squirrels.
(Player1) tries to kill as many squirrels as they can, but there are too many.
(Player1) uses the squirrels to their advantage, shoving (Player2) into them
(Player1), in agony, kills (Player2) so they do not have to be attacked by the squirrels.
The squirrels separate and kill (Player1) and (Player2).

arena.title: Event: Volcano
arena.description: A volcano erupts near the center of the arena.

fatal.text: (Player1) is buried in ash.
(Player1) suffocates.
(Player1) pushes (Player2) in the lava.
(Player1) dips their weapon in the lava and kills (Player2) with it.
As (Player1) trips over (Player2) into the lava, they grab {1.him_her} and pull them down with them.

arena.title: Event: Total Darkness
arena.description: The arena turns pitch black and no one can see a thing.

fatal.text: (Player1) trips on a rock and falls off a cliff.
(Player1) accidentally makes contact with spiny, lethal plant life.
(Player1) flails their weapon around, accidentally killing (Player2).
(Player1) finds and kills (Player2), who was making too much noise.
While fighting, (Player1) and (Player2) lose their balance, roll down a jagged hillside, and die.
(Player1) is consumed.
(Player1) was no match for the ants.
(Player1) watches horrifically as (Player2) is devoured alive.
(Player1) and (Player2) run away, but (Player1) trips (Player2) and leaves them to die.
(Player1) offers (Player2) as a sacrifice, the fucking ants kill them both anyway
